item.title: Threads now lets you manage Hidden Words separately from Instagram, set time limits
item.description: Threads, Meta’s competitor to X, now has its own Hidden Words settings that operates separately from Instagram.

item.title: Uber has Atlanta’s autonomous ride-hailing and delivery market on lock

item.title: Rivian cuts dozens on manufacturing team ahead of R2 launch
item.description: The company laid off around 1% of its total workforce, or around 140 employees. It's the third round of cuts since the start of 2024.
